storyInfo: Seeking her father, Waai Fu follows Lee's tracks to Shangshu. She's surprised to discover that here, a lot of the people perceive the martial arts in a subtly different way...

attributes.content: Hit me.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Strength from the ground, fist and feet communicating. Always be aware of what's under your step! Stand up!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Do not chase the hands, do not clash with the body. See my movements clearly, be aware of your own self! Stand up!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Yes, Dad!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: When we train in kung fu, you call me Shih-fu!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Strength through six harmonies, force within one ts'un! Is this how little power your fists hold?!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: (Panting) Yes...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Dad? Where are you going?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: To find something. Something that can make me stronger.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Can you take me with you? Don't leave me all alone...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I won't stop to wait for you. If you want to stand by my side, then catch me, by your own efforts.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Dad—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It just doesn't make sense!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hei-yo, it's been madness these days. Not one day of calm.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: What? What doesn't click about what I just said, Miss Heroine?
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I'm being framed, head to tail! What proof do you have it was me who injured your schoolbrother?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This recording's the proof. If you have any doubts, we could report it to the authorities. Let them decide if this is 'harm with intent,' right?
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: This recording's clearly out of context. I wasn't even using any strength there. How could that possibly hurt him?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Those are some big words! If it took no strength to get our second-in-line so hurt, he'd be dead if you put any effort into it, wouldn't he?
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: A coin for a coin, a life for a life. When you hurt someone... you'd better cough up their hospital fees. Here's the bill for your perusal.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: This much?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Our schoolbrother kickboxes to feed himself. If he can't fight anymore, that's every meal for the rest of his life gone with it. Of course he needs careful treatment.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I—I don't have this much.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Of course. You're so young; it's understandable you have no savings. We're not out just to trouble you here. But we have a way.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: What way?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You take on this written challenge. Our first-in-line invites you to a kung fu competition three days from now, for our school to uphold its name.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I go for another round so you can stick another battery charge on me?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Don't be so sure of yourself. You only beat our second after he held back out of kindness, and our first's skill is in a league beyond his. Victory is up in the air.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Only, our second's still lying in hospital, so winning this will be... well, you think about it, Miss Heroine.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I understand. You want me to lose on purpose, or else you'll keep hanging this 'harm with intent' thing over me.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hey, hey, let's be clear, those were your words just now, not mine.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Made your choice? It's the bill or the challenge. One or the other, you know?
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Fine... I accept the challenge.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Then go ahead and sign it with your mark. At noon, three days from now, the Plated Fists will arrange a feast at the Jianlan Tavern in the mountains. We insist you grace us, when the time comes.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Also, we'll be holding onto this recording for now. If you skip Shangshu all by yourself, don't blame us when—
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Say no more. Three days from now? I'll be there.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hahaha. You're a forthright one, Miss Heroine. Until then.
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: You crooked punk—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hours earlier...
Shoot... I was only a few days behind, and Uncle Lee's already out of Shangshu. Uncle Liang chose this exact time to transfer, too. Now can I talk to...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Um, what's that up ahead?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This is the grand ten-year anniversary of our Plated Fist opening a training hall in Shangshu, and we'll be performing on this stage.
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Thanks to our fellow townspeople and our martial allies, everyone who signs up for a course today gets 30% off!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Is kung fu really this thick in the air in Shangshu? I might just get leads on my dad, if I ask around here.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This guy in front's got a sturdy figure, and he seems pretty skilled. Let's see what kind of show he puts on.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Brothers and sisters, let us display the Eighty One Techniques of the Plated Fist, and give the audience a taste of our kung fu!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: These techniques have been a closely-guarded secret, but today is the day we make an exception! We'll open your eyes!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Hyah!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioners

attributes.content: Hm... a lot of the apprentices in the back move slightly stiffly. They're lacking both coordination and force. Probably still haven't been training for long. Commendable vigor, though.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The Techniques of the Plated Fist are time-honored and deep-rooted. If you train hard, you'll be guaranteed to improve your health and live longer.
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: I'll show you all the results of extended, intense training in our secret techniques! Brother, bring it out!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: S-Such thick marble, and three blocks at once! Is he going to split them all in one chop?
attributes.name: Staged(?) Female Passerby

attributes.content: There's no way! No human could ever pull off something like this!
attributes.name: Staged(?) Male Passerby

attributes.content: Everyone, watch carefully—hyah!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Kung fu isn't about simple, brute force. Isn't drawing all this attention a little overboard...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hahaha, that was nothing. Train our techniques to the highest level, and you won't need punches or kicks—you can hurt people with your mind alone!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Observe. With just one chop of the air, I can blast someone over ten meters away!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Brother! I'll face you!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Good on you! This is a heavy one, so be careful! Hyah—
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: This is all so fake!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Miss, we haven't met, have we? What are you smearing our kung fu for?!
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Smearing? It's incredible you act so righteous while you trick people with this cheap act.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: 'Hitting people with the air?' What are you teaching, martial arts or Originium Arts?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hahahaha... Miss, you've seen nothing. I'm not arguing with you.
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: You have to understand, once a man develops his physical potential to the very limit, kickboxing is mightier than Originium Arts could ever be.
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Really? As luck has it, I've been training for a couple years too. I'd like to ask, seeing as you're my senior—what power does your fist at 'the very limits' have there?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: She's coming at you! Quick, get down!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: What kind of house or school are you from? Are you really going to fight me in front of a crowd?
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: I'm from no house or school. If your conscience is clear, why should you care how many people are watching?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Fine, then each of us makes three moves and no more, the kung fu way. You can go first, since you're a girl.
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: Are you sure you want me to go first?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What, are you scared?
attributes.name: Second Apprentice

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (This guy probably never practiced any real kung fu. Take a little care. Let's not hurt him.)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (Just make him fall on his face. All he needs is a little humble pie.)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Alright, haiyah!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Brother! Brother!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Eek! He's not getting up, he's not moving! Is he foaming at the mouth?
attributes.name: Female Passerby

attributes.content: Run! That might've been a murder!
attributes.name: Male Passerby

attributes.content: W-What? I didn't put any force into that!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I didn't find out anything about Uncle Lee or my dad, and I got sucked into this mess to boot. If Aak finds out, he'll die laughing.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I can't let that bunch of kung fu cheats carry on their evildoing, but if they went to the authorities...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: How do I handle this?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Who's there? Come out!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Relax, Miss Heroine!
There's Plated Fist people in the shadows all around here. I have to be careful not to catch their attention.
Who are you, and what do you want with me?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'm a student of the Traceless Fist. Don't worry, Miss Heroine, I've nothing to do with the Plated at all.
Who knew Shangshu had so many schools of kung fu?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: There's close to fifty in all, big and small. The Plated you offended yesterday number as one of the largest. You don't know just how big of a headache you've made for yourself, I worry.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: They extorted me for about two years' worth of my wages. I couldn't be clearer.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: This isn't a simple matter of money. When you crashed their stage yesterday in front of everyone, you may as well have smashed up their sign, and that's the biggest taboo in the kung fu world.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: They're going to regain face in the coming challenge, no holds barred. No matter how supreme your kung fu, I fear alone, you'll be...
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Let me ask this. You're a martial artist too. You'd sit back and watch them so blatantly swindle people?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You may not know this, but we've always had a rule: We of the martial ways don't spoil our fellows' livelihoods.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: If sides are displayed winning or losing in a public setting, then it's common for the loser to offer a 'reconciliation gift,' and then arrange for a feast.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: The two sides each send a representative, the two publicly discuss how no one style is inferior to another, and they go back to minding their own business.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: If someone violates this rule, then all the schools target them, ensuring it's hard for them to find their footing in Shangshu.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I mean, I'm against going around challenging schools too, but doesn't this stink of a sham?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: And on top of that, you make it sound like you're all cozy with each other. Are you saying you do things pretty much the way the Plated do too?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: We just exaggerate a little to advertise—let's put that aside for now. The main thing I'm here for is to make you a deal. An excellent one.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: You declare to everyone that you're a follower of our Traceless Fist, and then our school sends someone to make peace with the Plated. That way, all your troubles are gone.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: You called this a 'deal.' I assume I have to do something?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Of course. There's always a give-and-take in the kung fu world. All we hope for, after things settle down, is that you come to our hall and be a nominal instructor for a month.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: A nominal instructor?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Haha, we won't make you teach us your secret techniques, of course. We just want you to stay with us. You can act as living publicity for our school.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: We won't make you stay for free, either. We'll pay you a month's wages, and split the Plated Fists' reconciliation gift 20/80! How do those terms s—
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Are you done?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You've made up your mind?
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I'll kindly refuse.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Er... If you feel it's an unfair price, we can still discuss—
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Listen. I may not be totally in the loop about this kung fu 'business,' and I'm probably not qualified to wax on about the rules and customs and so on?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: But to my eyes, this fraud has no fundamental respect for the martial arts at all. I would never accept it.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Miss Heroine, you seem to be mistaken...
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: The age of true kung fu is long gone... We're all just putting on a show to make a living. That's not some terrible crime.
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: All we ever need is to save a little face. Why take this so seriously?
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Maybe you're right. Maybe I shouldn't judge the lives of others so lightly.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: We're just of different mind and different ways. Thank you for your 'kindness,' and goodbye.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Come on... You're so young, girl. Why are you clinging to something so old-fashioned?
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: What era do you think this is? All the real warriors have been beaten to death by now...
attributes.name: Traceless Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Dad, is your kung fu so strong that nobody could beat you?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What a joke.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: How vast do you think the land is? Just because I pass through a few cities with no opponent, I can pretend I'm number one?
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: But you've trained so hard, and you look for opponents everywhere. So why?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Training is training. Why all the 'why?'
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: All I'm doing is seeking the masters, finding the peaks. Only by witnessing the heights of the sky and the breadths of the land can I know where I stand, can I go further!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: To reach the 'peak of perfection' of the martial way, that is my life's wish!
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Dad, just what is it you're searching for, even now...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: There's a rough face you're pulling, guest. Not used to Shangshu spice?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No, not that. The food's great, it's just my own worries.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Peheh, I happened to overhear. Those people made a fine racket in the inn yesterday, and I heard talk of you getting caught up in it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I must've made a mockery of myself—no, I'm the one who got you caught up in this.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: No harm done. What are you planning to do now, though, Miss?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I know what. I've already agreed to the challenge, so I have to show up. And I'm going to have a fair and square martial competition with them, no tricks or schemes.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's something all martial artists understand. 'Seek to go forth, think not to halt.' I made this mess myself, so no matter what happens, it's my responsibility to bear it.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Fine words. Your righteousness is commendable, young lady, but I think you should know what it means to take it all on yourself.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The first apprentice, in your upcoming match, is probably just as much a martial nobody. But if they're scrambling to control the damage, whipping out every dirty trick in the book, do you think you'll cope with the onslaught?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'll do all I can.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: And further, if you win, and they kick off and call you the wrongdoer instead, then I'm sorry, but even if their sort can't lay hands on you, it'd never be worth it to get tangled in a lawsuit.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Besides, ultimately, you can't stomach the way they connive together, pulling their dirty tricks. Even if you teach the Plated Fists a lesson, what use will that be in the kung fu circle of Shangshu?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You have a point, sir...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I don't like to lecture on my seniority. But I hope you give some weight to what I've told you, young lady.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I'm not interested in meaningless scuffles, and at the same time I don't want those people getting what they wish for. But no matter what, I can't see a way I can pull off both.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: There's always some way. You just have to think a little outside the box to find it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Outside the box, you say...?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The way the world works, it's like a net. Sometimes it's protective, and sometimes it ties you up like a finfish—and it's not something you can use your fists to shake off.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: In this net, the way you act and carry yourself gets bound up, and there's rules to play by. Know what it wants, and you'll know what it fears.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Just rambling, rambling. You don't need to understand what it means just yet, hahaha...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Know what it means, know what it fears...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: They won't let me go without a match, and it's just to win back their reputation.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If they love face so much, I could just give them some.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It looks like you have a plan, young lady?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Thank you for your advice, sir. I think I've got a solution!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What's happening? Who invited so many other halls here?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: We don't know! We heard your warning, we kept away from all the other schools!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Even the 'Yin-Yang,' 'Seven Shocks' and 'White Feather' houses are here. You think they just came on their own?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: Please, brother! I genuinely have no idea what happened!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: I'll get you all for this later! Is the one who beat up our second here yet?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: She is! She's over there!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: What's with that flag she's holding?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: With all eyes on her, Waai Fu ascends the arena, and stands a flagpole easily a zhang high in the center. The banner flutters, on one side written '#1 in Shangshu,' an awe-inspiring scene.
(Innkeeper Zheng really did invite all these people.)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (I've never spoken in front of this many before. I'm kind of nervous...)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (Huff—)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Ahem—Thank you, martial minds, for accepting the invitation to this meeting.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I am Waai Fu, taught in the ways of the Hong Mei Wing Chun. I had the privilege to meet the followers of the Plated Fist some days ago. It was perhaps even... instant chemistry.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: My seniors are determined to exhibit their house's prowess, and invite me upon this stage with them, so we can compete for number one in Shangshu kung fu.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What?! You l—
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: It was the Plated who arranged for this feast. Isn't that true?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Zheng Q—Innkeeper Zheng, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: It's the most interesting thing to happen to our kung fu in a while. Let a rickety man join in the fun.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: No need to greet me, you sit for now.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Very well...
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: Though I can only speak for so little, I want to do my own part to revitalize the kung fu scene here, so I've taken it upon myself to establish this challenge.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Whoever bests me gets this '#1 in Shangshu' flag. The last one standing on this stage takes it to hang it in their own hall.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Good nephew, I hear your house's master has been traveling far as of recent. You truly show determination for your school in arranging this battle as its first disciple.
attributes.name: Seven Shocks Fist House

attributes.content: It seems the Plated Fist's undertakings are so grand, Shangshu alone couldn't hold them anymore.
attributes.name: White Feather Fist House

attributes.content: Go on, then. Take up that flag and give us old fogeys a good slap and a what-for, hm?
attributes.name: Yin-Yang Fist House

attributes.content: Honored Shih-fus, this is all wrong, it's a misunderstanding...
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: I thought it would be a shame to take up your invitation to the Plated Fist's banquet but have no one to fight, so... what say you about this contest, schoolbrother?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You must be joking, Miss... I've only invited everyone here for some tea and a meal. What's this talk of competition?
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: If you would just quickly put this banner away...
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: Er, could it be I misunderstood your intent, brother?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Alright. If that's what you say, then that's what I'll heed. This contest today is thus canceled.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Waai Fu makes a quick sideways chop, and the solid wood flagpole, thick as a wide bowl, topples in answer. The '#1 in Shangshu' banner lands neatly in her hands.
Wow, look at how thick that pole was, and the cut even looks genuine!
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Brother, I want to learn that! When will Shih-fu teach us that?
attributes.name: Plated Fist Practitioner

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: First Apprentice

attributes.content: If there's nothing else today, I'll be taking my leave for now, so as not to spoil your teatime mood.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I'll keep this flag in my care for now. If anyone still wants this '#1 in Shangshu' title, you can challenge me at any time. I'll gladly offer up this flag to you, if you beat me.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: May fate bid us to meet again, martial minds.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Thank you, sir. Without your help, that could've been a much stickier situation.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: No thanks necessary. You came up with the plan yourself, really. I just sent a few letters, nothing worth mentioning.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: You have more than diligent training. There's a fine, clever mind in there too. Very rare.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You know, my own little girl's around your age, and she has kung fu to speak of at that. If she were half as prudent as you, I wouldn't be getting so many white hairs.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I really am flattered, sir.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Is something still troubling you, even after getting free of that mess?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I've learned martial arts from my father ever since I was young. The one thing he said to me most was 'Martial arts have yin and yang, humans have straight and crooked.' With improper intent, you'll never master your kung fu.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: I always thought every fighter would be like my father, set on martial progress and nothing else. Now I've seen the way the martial world's become, and I feel like it's just not right.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The martial world is wherever the martial artists are. There's people devoted to the way, like your father, and of course there's people just in it for a living. But in the end, the 'martial world' is still bound to fade away.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The schools you see now were different decades ago. But the longer the days of peace, the less traveling the country calls for kung fu in your pocket. The training gets less diligent in turn.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: They say 'martial arts to halt a war.' When the people no longer need martial arts, that's the day we'll truly be at peace.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Sir, about that. I have a small objection.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Oh? Go ahead, young lady.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: The halls all think times are peaceful enough not to need any kung fu, and my father's been searching for an opponent all his life... I've been thinking over it these past few days, and I feel—the martial arts don't need anything external to show their worth.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Martial arts are like a mirror, they reflect your own will, your own state of mind. Practicing them is recognizing yourself. It's that one, 'with no purpose and no self, there is no boundary and no end'.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: That's what I believe for sure. Or maybe that's just... the arrogance of the young.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Hahahahaha, well said! I was thinking all these schools in Shangshu would end up vanishing in a few years, if they were left alone.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: But what I've seen these past few days really changed my mind. At least in this moment, every day the martial world still exists is a day it should live loud and strong.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: If there's no one in the 'business' who'll rectify the mood, I won't mind wading in myself.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Really?! Sir, I would absolutely be willing to help you, if that's what you think!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Haha, your feelings are loud and clear, young lady. But it's a long, long way to build, and you've got more pressing things to do right now, don't you?
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: Huh? How do you know—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: A man by the name of Lee left a letter here a few days ago. He said a girl called Waai would come to Shangshu looking for him, and to hand it to her.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: I worried it'd buck your mood back then, so I didn't bring it up. Now's the time to give it to you.
attributes.name: Innkeeper Zheng

attributes.content: A letter from Uncle Lee?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: To my fine niece Waai Fu, I hope this letter finds you well. I've gotten ahold of some news about your father, and I'm right on my way back to... Lungmen?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: So I made this whole trip for nothing?!
attributes.name: Waai Fu
